Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL ?; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Demotic ostracon
Description: This Demotic ostracon of the Ptolemaic Period contains the receipt, issued for payment of the salt tax. The text mentions, apart from the payment formula with the name of the taxpayer, the total sum and the month for which the tax is due, the names of three signatory scribes and a date.
